result.eng: Your father will be in good health again before long.
result.ga: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfadYour father will be in good health again before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ d'aṫair ina ẛláinte arís sul i ḃfadYour father will be in good health again before long.

result.ga: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.orig: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.html: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sise óg agus ḃí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.

result.eng: I am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ga: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.orig: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.html: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Buíoċas le Dia tá mo ẛláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.

result.eng: We have to drink to your health.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid do shláinte a ól
result.orig: Caithfidh muid do shláinte a ól
result.html: Caithfidh muid do shláinte a ólWe have to drink to your health.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid do ẛláinte a ólWe have to drink to your health.

result.eng: He raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ga: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.orig: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.html: D'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ sé a ġloine ċun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.

result.eng: He meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ga: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.orig: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.html: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maithHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ponchtml: Ní sláinte an ċoirp aṁáin a ḃí i gceist aige aċ sláinte na haigne ċoṁ maiṫHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.

result.eng: His health started declining and he died.
result.ga: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.orig: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.html: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ an tsláinte ag meaṫ air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.

result.eng: He knew his health was getting worse.
result.ga: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip air
result.orig: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip air
result.html: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip airHe knew his health was getting worse.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sé go raiḃ an tsláinte ag teip airHe knew his health was getting worse.

result.eng: I am worried about the baby's health.
result.ga: Tá mé buartha faoi shláinte an linbh
result.orig: Tá mé buartha faoi shláinte an linbh
result.html: Tá mé buartha faoi shláinte an linbhI am worried about the baby's health.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé buarṫa faoi ẛláinte an linḃI am worried about the baby's health.

result.eng: And we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ga: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.orig: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.html: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ponchtml: Agus beiḋ muid ag casaḋ sna tiṫe táḃairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireaḋ seaċtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ponchtml: Ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
